title: Ep. 43: Grace & Becca’s Favorite Things – Apps, Podcasts, and Beauty Products, Oh My!
itunes:title: Ep. 42: Grace & Becca’s Favorite Things – Apps, Podcasts, and Beauty Products, Oh My!
description:
In this episode, *cue Oprah voice* it’s Grace and Becca’s favorite things! We are taking our weekly obsessions to a new level. We talk about everything we are loving right now, from TV shows and podcasts, to beauty products and clothing. We didn’t want you to miss any of these recommendations, so we have listed every one of them in our Facebook group, so now is the perfect time to join!

Also in this episode, Becca has a horrible book hangover from Ashley Spivey’s recommendation, The Idea of You, and Grace is gearing up for a yoga retreat.

 

For the full list of obsessions, CLICK HERE.

 

Books mentioned:

The Idea of You by Robinne Lee

The Seasonaires by Janna King

 

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
